items.sentence: Tom is going to have to take better care of himself.
Tom is well aware of what is going on at the office.
Tom likes sitting on the beach in the early morning.
Lots of people in Japan are indifferent to politics.
Many children enjoy eating peanut butter sandwiches.
Mary and Alice showed me pictures of their husbands.
Please say hello to her if you see her at the party.
Please simmer the beans for a while over a low heat.
She agreed with him that I should go to the meeting.
She became aware that her parents were watching her.
She explained to him why she was late for his party.
I don\'t feel well. Could you give me some medicine?
It\'s not a good idea to ask a woman how old she is.
I hope that you won\'t make the same mistake as Tom.
I know that most people here don\'t like doing that.
Tom lied when he told Mary that he had won the race.
Tom likes to eat mashed potatoes with lots of gravy.
Tom never complains, no matter how hard the work is.
Tom never even saw a computer until he was thirteen.
Tom reminded Mary that she needed to buy some bread.
Tom thought Cookie would be a good name for his dog.
Tom thought about it and agreed that Mary was right.
Tom thought he was doing what Mary wanted him to do.
Tom thought it would be a good idea to see a doctor.
Tom thought that Mary was asking too many questions.
Tom thought that Mary was hiding something from him.
I\'ll see if Tom knows how to program in JavaScript.
I\'m beginning to regret not studying French harder.
I\'m doing my best to get everything done by Monday.
Tom and Mary always play tennis on Saturday morning.
Tom and Mary got married three weeks after they met.
Tom and Mary have a small garden behind their house.
Tom and Mary have actually never been on a date yet.
I don\'t care how much it itches. Don\'t scratch it.
I don\'t know if we\'re going to be able to do that.
What makes you think Tom had anything to do with it?
What time did Tom say he was leaving in the morning?
What was the name of the last song you sang tonight?
What you have just said reminds me of an old saying.
There\'s something about Tom that gets on my nerves.
Tom doesn\'t like to hang out with people who smoke.
Fresh fruit and vegetables are good for your health.
Go wake up Tom and tell him that breakfast is ready.
Have you been fighting with the boy next door again?
Have you been told when you are expected to be here?
Have you given any thought to having dinner with me?
Have you read the whole paper from beginning to end?
Tom picked out an interesting book for Mary to read.
Tom picked the coin up and examined it more closely.
